LRMF3 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Coerce an object to LRMF class

Source: R/as_mf.R, R/object.R
mf.Rd

A low rank matrix factorization of a matrix X is parameterized by X ~= u %*% diag(d) %*% t(v).

as_mf(x, ...)

mf(u, d, v, subclasses = NULL, ...)

Arguments

x

Object to coerce
...

Optional additional items to pass to the constructor.
u

The "left singular-ish" vectors.
d

The "singular-ish" values.
v

The "right singular-ish" vectors.
subclasses

A character vector of subclasses. Optional, defaults to NULL.

Value

Examples


s <- svd(as.matrix(trees))

# using the constructor directly
mf(s$u, s$d, s$v)
#> $u

# coercing svd-like lists
as_mf(s)
